```{r}
j1 <- 1
j2 <- 2
cur_cols <- paste0("meandim", c(j1, j2))
coords <- centroids %>%
  filter(split == "train") %>%
  select(one_of(cur_cols))
colnames(coords) <- c("x", "y")
inference::image_grid(coords, paths, min_dist = .4, density = 5, imsize = 1) +
  labs(
    x = sprintf("Learned Feature %s", j1),
    y = sprintf("Learned Feature %s", j2)
  )
```
